results.title: Loss of FEZ1, a gene deleted in Jacobsen syndrome, causes locomotion defects and early mortality by impairing motor neuron development.
results.text_hl: Loss of @GENE_FEZ1 @GENE_9638 @@@FEZ1@@@, a gene deleted in @DISEASE_Jacobsen_Distal_11q_Deletion_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D054868 @@@Jacobsen syndrome@@@, causes @<m>DISEASE_Gait_Disorders_Neurologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020233 @@@locomotion defects@@@ and early mortality by impairing motor neuron development.

citations.NLM: Gunaseelan S, Wang Z, Tong VKJ, Ming SWS, Razar RBBA, Srimasorn S, Ong WY, Lim KL, Chua JJE. Loss of FEZ1, a gene deleted in Jacobsen syndrome, causes locomotion defects and early mortality by impairing motor neuron development. Hum Mol Genet. 2021 Mar 25;30(1):5-20. PMID: 33395696
citations.BibTeX: @article{33395696, title={Loss of FEZ1, a gene deleted in Jacobsen syndrome, causes locomotion defects and early mortality by impairing motor neuron development.}, author={Gunaseelan S and Wang Z and Tong VKJ and Ming SWS and Razar RBBA and Srimasorn S and Ong WY and Lim KL and Chua JJE}, journal={Hum Mol Genet}, volume={30}, number={1}, pages={5-20}}

results.title: Metformin-induced encephalopathy without lactic acidosis in a patient with contraindication for metformin.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@-induced @DISEASE_Brain_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001927 @@@encephalopathy@@@ without @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@ in a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with contraindication for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Jung EY, Cho HS, Seo JW, Kim DW, Kim HJ, Chang SH, Park DJ. Metformin-induced encephalopathy without lactic acidosis in a patient with contraindication for metformin. Hemodial Int. 2009 Apr;13(2):172-5. PMID: 19432690
